SEARCH
Package jpa.security

Class AccessTokenServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
jpa.security.AccessTokenServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccessTokenService
public class AccessTokenServiceImpl extends Object implements AccessTokenService
Default implementation producing HMAC-SHA256 signed JWT access tokens.

This component also generates and hashes opaque refresh tokens.

    • AccessTokenServiceImpl

      public AccessTokenServiceImpl(String signingKey, long accessTokenTtlSeconds, long refreshTokenTtlSeconds)
      Builds a token service with explicit signing key and TTL values.
      Parameters:
      signingKey - secret used to sign JWT payloads
      accessTokenTtlSeconds - access-token lifetime in seconds
      refreshTokenTtlSeconds - refresh-token lifetime in seconds

      Creates a signed JWT access token for the given user identity.
      Specified by:
      createAccessToken in interface AccessTokenService
      Parameters:
      user - authenticated user
      role - resolved user role to embed in claims
      issuedAt - token issue instant
      expiresAt - token expiration instant
      Returns:
      compact JWT string

      Generates a cryptographically random opaque refresh token.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • hashRefreshToken

      public String hashRefreshToken(String rawToken)
      Hashes an opaque refresh token before persistence.
      Specified by:
      hashRefreshToken in interface AccessTokenService
      Parameters:
      rawToken - raw refresh token provided by the client
      Returns:
